column4: hi all, how is ubuntu 64 bit these days? i'm running vista 64 bit and it appears to be great, am I likely to run into any problems with the edgy 64 bit version in terms of software and driver availability?
what about using automatix or easyubuntu? will they work ok with the 64 bit versions?
well, considering he does support professionally, I'd take his recommendation over other individuals ;)
lol, ok well can't really argue then can I :)
